Chill until firm and garnish with chocolate curls and chopped nuts.
fc1f93e1ef.pred:
In a small saucepan, combine the ginger snaps, butter and sugar.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until the ginger snaps are melted and the mixture is smooth.
Remove from the heat and stir in the egg yolks.
Stir in the gelatin and cold water.
Return to the heat and cook, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens.
Remove from the heat and stir in the cream and rum.
Pour into a 9-inch pie plate.
Cool to room temperature.
Refrigerate until set.
Garnish with chocolate curls and chopped nuts.

0d6724156e.gt:
Slice tofu in half lengthwise, then cut each half into two long strips, approximately 1/2-inch thick.
Mix remaining ingredients in a small bowl.
Lay tofu strips in a shallow pan and pour marinade over, turning tofu to coat.
Marinade for at least 1 hour, or as long as overnight.
Heat oil in grill or nonstick pan over high heat.
Sear tofu on each side until browned and heated through, approximately 2-3 minutes per side.
0d6724156e.pred:
Combine all ingredients in a medium bowl.
Stir well.
Refrigerate until ready to use.
Grill tofu until golden brown, about 5 minutes per side.
Serve with chili lime marinade.

133d9c352d.gt:
If berries are frozen, slightly thaw.
In a bowl, stir together sugar and flour.
Add fruit to sugar mixture, tosing well and spread mixture into baking dish.
Preheat oven to 375.
Topping:
Coarsely chop pistachios.
In a bowl, mix the flour and sugars.
Cut the butter into cubes with your fingers or a pastry blender, blending the flour mixture until it resembles coarse meal.
Add pistachios and toss well.
Squeeze a handful of topping together and coarsely crumble in chunks over filling.
Squeeze and evenly crumble remaining topping over filling in same manner.
Bake crisp in oven until filling is bubbling and topping is crisp and golden, about 50 minutes.
(can be done in advance).
Just before serving, heat crisp in 300 oven for 20 - 30 minutes until just warm.
Serve with ice cream or frozen yogurt.
Note: When measuring out the fruit.
I just add the blueberries and enough rhubarb to the baking dish, taking in to allowance the shrinkage of cooking.
If no rhubarb is available, just use all blueberries.
133d9c352d.pred:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.
In a large bowl, combine the sugar, flour, and pistachios.
Add the rhubarb and blueberries and mix well.
Pour into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
In a separate bowl, combine the brown sugar, butter, and flour.
Mix well and sprinkle over the rhubarb mixture.
Bake for 45 minutes, or until the topping is golden brown.
Serve warm.

73d512de54.gt:
Split eggplants in half and scoop out flesh, leaving 1/4 inch thick sides.
Drop flesh in boiling water for 5 minutes, remove, drain in colander.
Repeat with shells, remove and drain, set aside.
Cook onion, garlic, green pepper and celery in half of the butter until tender.
Add eggplant flesh, parsley, thyme, shrimp, salt and pepper, worcestershire and cayenne.
Add eggs to above, cook 5 minutes.
Fill shells with mixture, sprinkle with bread crumbs and bake 20-30 minutes at 350 degrees.
Melt remaining butter, pour over eggplants, sprinkle with parmesan cheese, serve hot.
73d512de54.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Cut eggplants in half lengthwise and scoop out the pulp, leaving a 1/4-inch shell.
In a large bowl, combine the scooped out pulp, butter, green pepper, onion, celery, parsley, bread crumbs, garlic, thyme, shrimp, salt and pepper, Worcestershire sauce, and cayenne pepper.
Stuff the eggplant shells with the mixture and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 45 minutes, or until the eggplant is tender and the stuffing is heated through.
Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and bake for 5 more minutes.

3d390b8cc2.gt:
Heat 1 T oil in a large soup pot over medium high heat.
Add sausage, and cook 3 to 4 minutes or until browned on all sides.
Transfer sausages to a plate.
Add remaining oil to drippings in pot to equal 1/4 C cup.
Whisk in flour Cook over low heat, stirring frequently for about 20 minutes or until mixture is dark reddish-brown.
Stir in onion, peppers, celery and garlic and saute over medium heat for 8 minutes or until softened.
Stir in stock and next 9 ingredients .
Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer, covered for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile cook grits according to package directions and and cheese.
Cover and keep warm.
Stir in sausage, shrimp, and crab sections and cook for about 3-4 minutes or until shrimp are just done.
Do not overcook.
Remove bay leaves and serve gumbo over cheese grits.
Season with hot sauce if desired.
3d390b8cc2.pred:
In a large pot, heat 1/2 cup oil over medium heat.
Add the sausage and cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
Add the flour and cook, stirring, for 1 minute.
Add the onion, bell peppers, celery, garlic, and cook until soft, about 5 minutes.
Add the stock and tomatoes and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 30 minutes.
Add the okra, thyme, bay leaves, salt, pepper, cayenne, file powder, and lime juice.
Simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes.
Add the grits and shrimp and cook until the shrimp are pink and the grits are tender, about 5 minutes.
Add the crab and cook until heated through, about 5 minutes.
Serve over rice and garnish with hot sauce, if desired.

d8fd0d2fdf.gt:
Heat oven to 375F; Grease cookie sheets.
In large bowl, combine butter and cream cheese; beat until smooth; Add sweetened condensed milk and egg; blend well.
Lightly spoon flour into measuring cup; level off; Add flour and brownie mix; mix well; (Reserve enclosed chocolate-flavored syrup packet for topping) Stir in pecans, coconut and chocolate chips; Drop dough by heaping tablespoonfuls 1 inch apart onto greased cookie sheets.
Bake at 375F for 9 to 12 minutes or until set; Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheets; Cool completely.
Cut very small hole in corner of reserved chocolate-flavored syrup packet; lightly drizzle over cooled cookies Store in tightly covered container.
d8fd0d2fdf.pred:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Grease a 13x9 inch pan.
In a large bowl, beat butter, cream cheese, and sweetened condensed milk until smooth.
Beat in egg.
Stir in flour, brownie mix, pecans, coconut, and chocolate chips.
Spread in pan.
Bake 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool.
Cut into bars.

b4e6dfe29e.gt:
Place all shake ingredients in a blender in the order listed.
Blend until it's as smooth as you like it.
Pour into a large parfait glass.
Top with whipped cream, sprinkle with chocolate sprinkles, green colored sugar, then place the cherry on top.
Insert a long-handled (parfait) spoon, two straws, and a candy cane.
Serve cuddled by the fireside listening to your favorite Christmas carols and watching your holiday tree glisten.
Just like two turtle doves.
Enjoy!
b4e6dfe29e.pred:
In a blender, combine peppermint candies, milk, ice cream, chocolate chips, Oreo cookies, Baileys, whipped cream, sugar, and chocolate sprinkles.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry and a candy cane.

0118ce719d.gt:
Toast your bread, butter it but not too much so its not soggy, put your seasonings on and dice into bite size pieces and you now have emergency croutons!
:)
0118ce719d.pred: Place croutons on bread and bake in oven at 350 degrees for 15 minutes.

8b4a7055f2.gt:
Mix mayo, soy, juice, wasabi and onion together, fold through the crab meat and pile into the prepared avocado.
Serve immediately.
8b4a7055f2.pred:
Combine all ingredients except crabmeat in a bowl.
Add crabmeat and mix well.
Serve as a salad or sandwich.

f37cddfed9.gt:
I've listed 1 rice cooker cup worth (before cooking) of rice, but use as much as you need depending on how much you need.
Incidentally, I filled a 880 ml and 500 ml capacity bento box (excluding the spaces for the sides) with 650 g of rice!
To prevent the rice from getting greasy, stir fry the ingredients with just a little oil (use anything you like).
Add the ketchup.
Stir fry while making sure you don't scorch it.
I think you will need about 2 tablespoons of ketchup per 1 rice cooker cup worth of rice (350 g when cooked).
Throw in the rice!
!
The rice will turn ketchup-colored.
Add the chicken soup stock granules to finish.
Add 1 tablespoon per 1 rice cooker cup worth of rice.
If you add too much ketchup, the rice will be soggy.
The ketchup will just lightly color the rice.
The chicken stock granules will flavor the rice.
Other dishes you could pack in your bento along with the rice is this mentsuyu katsudon (pork cutlets on rice with sauce).
The rice won't become soggy.
Make omurice with scrambled eggs.
f37cddfed9.pred:
Heat the wiener sausages in a frying pan.
Add the ketchup and chicken soup stock granules.
Cook until the sausages are heated through.
Add the rice and mix well.
Cook for 1 minute.
Serve with the mixed frozen vegetables.

102a7a90be.gt:
In a large pot, heat the 2 tablespoons of oil.
Add the onion and garlic and cook over moderate heat until softened, 5 minutes.
Add the chiles and cook until sizzling, 1 minute.
Add the dandelion greens and cook, stirring, until wilted, 1 minute.
Add the stock and pecorino rind and bring to a boil.
Simmer over low heat until the greens are very tender, about 1 hour.
Season with salt.
Rub the grilled bread with the lemon.
Place a baguette slice in each of 6 bowls.
Ladle in the greens and broth, drizzle with olive oil and garnish with pecorino.
Serve with the remaining toasts.
102a7a90be.pred:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large, deep skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat.
Add the onion and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until the onion is softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the chiles and cook, stirring, until they begin to soften, about 2 minutes.
Add the chicken stock and bring to a simmer.
Add the dandelion greens and cook, stirring, until they are wilted, about 5 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Transfer the mixture to a large casserole dish.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven until the greens are tender, about 30 minutes.
Remove the foil and bake until the top is golden, about 15 minutes.
Sprinkle the pecorino rind and shavings over the top and return to the oven until the cheese is melted and bubbling, about 5 minutes.
Serve the braised greens with the baguette slices and lemon wedges.

675ec6c36f.gt:
Mix dry ingredients together in medium bowl.
Add all wet ingredients (eggs, buttermilk, and oil) to a separate bowl and stir just until blended.
If you need to substitute for the buttermilk: in a liquid measure put 2 Tbsp lemon juice and then fill the rest of the way to the 2c level with regular milk or milk substitute.
(it's a 1T to 1c ratio).
Add the wet ingredient to the dry ingredients just until combined.
Do not over mix, batter will be slightly lumpy.
Lightly coat skillet with oil.
Heat to medium low.
Drop 1/4 cup of batter onto heated skillet.
Use the back side of a spoon to help even out the batter.
Cook on first side until bubbles begin to form on surface and underside is golden, about 2 minutes.
Flip over and cook another 2 minutes until golden brown and center springs back when lightly touched.
Serve warm with maple syrup and butter.
675ec6c36f.pred:
Preheat oven to 200 degrees F.
In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together buttermilk, eggs and oil.
Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Pour batter onto a hot griddle or skillet and cook until bubbles form on top.
Flip pancakes and cook until golden brown on the other side.
Serve warm with butter and syrup.

b3016a1ae9.gt:
Divide cucumber slices among canning jars.
Add 1/2 teaspoon pickling spice and 1/2 teaspoon turmeric to each jar.
Stir vinegar, water, sugar, and sea salt together in a large saucepan and bring to a boil.
Cook and stir until the sugar and salt dissolve; cook at a boil for 2 minutes.
Carefully fill jars with brine to within 1/2 inch of the rim, covering the cucumbers completely.
Discard any leftover brine.
Place the lids on the jars.
Refrigerate at least 24 hours before serving.
Store in the refrigerator for up to 6 months.
b3016a1ae9.pred:
Preheat oven to 200 degrees F.
Wash and dry the cucumber slices.
Place the cucumber slices in a large bowl and sprinkle with pickling spice and turmeric.
In a small saucepan, combine the vinegar, water, sugar, and salt.
Bring to a boil, stirring to dissolve the sugar.
Pour the hot liquid over the cucumber slices and toss to coat.
Place the cucumber slices in the jars, leaving 1/2 inch headspace.
Cover with lids and rings.
Place the jars in a large pot and cover with water.
Bring to a boil, then lower the heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Remove the jars from the water and let cool.
Once cool, store in the refrigerator.

b8a3ed253e.gt:
Mince the carrot, onion, garlic.
I make it with a food processor to save time.
Heat olive oil in a pot.
Add minced carrot, onion and garlic.
Add the ground beef and stir.
After meat is cooked, add the ingredients marked and stir frequently.
Otherwise the sauce may splatter.
Serve the sauce generously over the boiled pasta.
It's best to eat it immediately, but you can freeze it up to a month and enjoy later.
You can also use the sauce to make amazing toast the next morning!
Put the sauce and sliced cheese on bread and toast.
b8a3ed253e.pred:
In a large pot, heat olive oil and saute onion and garlic until onion is translucent.
Add ground beef and cook until no longer pink.
Add carrot and cook until soft.
Add tomatoes, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, sugar, and soup stock cubes.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package directions.
When sauce is ready, add spaghetti and cook until heated through.
Serve with a salad and enjoy!

aed9e73eab.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 F degrees.
Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
In a large mixing bowl, combine flour and salt.
Add oil, syrup and egg yolks; stir well.
Add milk and mashed bananas; stir well.
Add chopped nuts and stir.
Beat egg whites until stiff; fold into batter.
Pour batter into prepared loaf pan.
Bake at 350 F for 50 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean.
aed9e73eab.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Grease a 9x5 loaf pan.
In a large bowl, combine flour, salt, and baking soda.
In a separate bowl, combine oil, maple syrup, eggs, and milk.
Stir in bananas and walnuts.
Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Pour into prepared pan and bake for 45 minutes.
Remove from oven and let cool in pan for 10 minutes.
Remove from pan and cool on a wire rack.

491516b698.gt:
peel banana and cut off ends.
slice banana diagonally so u get oval shaped pieces.
u need 12 slices.
thickness to ur liking.
arange 4 banana slices on a plate.
two on two.
top two pointing upwards and bottom two pointing downward.
they should touch in the middle( it should resemble butterfly wings or a four leaf clover)
arrange 4 dried cranberries in the middle of the wings going up and down.
this is the body.
arrange 3 raisins on top wins and 2 raisins on bottom wings.
take the icing or gel and make 2 long feelers coming out of the top half of the dried cranberry.
repeat with rest of ingredients.
feel free to exsperiment wih different fruits.
good ones to work with are (strawberries, kiwi for the wings) pieces pineapple, chocolate chips, for decorating the wings (pretzel sticks or almond slivers for the feelers) get creative with the kids and have fun!
enjoy!
:)
makes 3 butterflies
491516b698.pred:
Fill a small bowl with the cranberries and raisins.
Mash the banana and mix with the icing or gel.
Spoon the banana mixture into the mold.
Decorate with the cranberries and raisins.
Refrigerate until set.
Cut into 4 pieces.
Serve.

20f8403190.gt:
Plunge the tomatoes into boiling water and then into iced water to remove their skins.
Chop the tomatoes and set aside.
In a stockpot, saute the onions and celery in the oil over medium heat until tender, 5 minutes.
Stir in the garlic, zucchini, corn and saute for another 2 minutes.
Add the broth and bring to a boil.
Add the tomatoes, salt and basil.
Reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the pasta, cover and simmer for 30 minutes (Seems rather a long time to me!
).
Sprinkle with the pepper & serve hot.
20f8403190.pred:
In a large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic; cook 3 minutes or until tender.
Add tomatoes, celery, zucchini, corn, and stock; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; simmer 10 minutes.
Add basil; cook 1 minute.
Add pasta; cook 8 to 10 minutes or until pasta is tender.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with a grind of pepper.

3f5aca8d35.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 F.
Beat eggs lightly in med bowl with wire whisk or hand beater.
Beat in flour, milk, and salt just until mixed.
Melt butter in 9 inch pie plate (use a pyrex to maximize puffiness) in oven.
Brush around pie plate to distribute evenly.
Sprinkle brown sugar and ground cinnamon evenly over the melted butter.
Arrange sliced apples over the sugar.
Pour batter over apple.
Bake 30-35 minutes.
Quickly loosen the edge of pancake and turn upside down onto a serving plate.
Serve with powdered sugar and lemon juice on the side.
3f5aca8d35.pred:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
In a large bowl, whisk together margarine, eggs, flour, milk, salt, brown sugar, and cinnamon.
Add apple slices and stir to combine.
Pour batter into a greased 9-inch pie plate.
Bake for 20 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
Serve with lemon juice and powdered sugar, if desired.

d47548a7fa.gt:
Preheat the oven to 450.
In a small saucepan, combine the figs and wine and bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer over moderately low heat until the figs are plump, 15 minutes.
Drain the figs; reserve the wine for another use.
Transfer the figs to a food processor and process until finely chopped.
Scrape the figs into a bowl.
Stir in the olives and 1 tablespoon of the olive oil; season with pepper.
In a large ovenproof skillet, heat the remaining 1 1/2 tablespoons of olive oil.
Pat the lamb chops dry, season with salt and pepper and add to the skillet.
Cook the chops over moderately high heat, turning once, until browned, about 8 minutes total.
Transfer the skillet to the oven and roast the chops for about 4 minutes longer, or until a thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the meat registers 125 for medium-rare.
Transfer the lamb chops to plates and serve with the olive-fig relish.
d47548a7fa.pred:
Place the lamb chops in a shallow dish.
Combine the figs, wine, olives, oil, and pepper in a food processor and pulse until the figs are chopped.
Pour the fig mixture over the lamb chops and marinate for 2 hours.
Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F.
Place the lamb chops on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes.
Turn the chops over and roast for 10 minutes more.
Serve with the relish.

4bf00ac974.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
For crust, add enough milk to egg yolk to measure 2/3 cup; set aside.
In medium bowl, combine flour and salt.
Cut in butter until crumbly.
With fork, stir in milk mixture until dough forms a ball.
You may need to add a few teaspoons more of milk if dough is still too dry.
Divide into halves.
Roll out half of the dough, on lightly floured surface, into a 15x10-inch rectangle.
Place on bottom of ungreased 15x10x1-inch jelly-roll pan.
For Filling, sprinkle cereal over top of crust; layer apples over cereal.
In small bowl, combine 1 cup granulated sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon and nutmeg.
Sprinkle over apples.
Roll remaining half of dough into a 15 1/2-10 1/2-inch rectangle; place over apples.
In small bowl, beat egg white with fork until foamy; brush over top crust.
In another small bowl, stir together 2 tablespoons granulated sugar and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon; sprinkle over top crust.
Bake for 45 to 60 minutes or until lightly browned.
For Glaze, in small bowl, stir together all glaze ingredients.
Drizzle over top crust while still warm.
Cut into bars.
4bf00ac974.pred:
In a large bowl, combine the egg yolk, egg white, milk, flour, salt, butter, and corn flakes.
Stir until well blended.
Add the apples, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla.
Mix well.
Pour into a greased 13 x 9-inch baking pan.
Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.
Cool completely.
Cut into bars.
Store in an airtight container.

9a2f1c9bd7.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Grease 9x13 pan.
Saute onion in butter til tender, don't brown.
Mix all ingredients together in bowl including onions and butter.
Pour potato mixture in pan and cover,bake aprox.
1 hour.
uncover last 10 minute.
9a2f1c9bd7.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Place potatoes in a 13x9x2 pan.
Mix soup and sour cream together and pour over potatoes.
Sprinkle onion and pepper over potatoes.
Melt butter and pour over potatoes.
Bake for 45 minutes.
Top with cheese and bake for 15 minutes.
Serve with broccoli, chicken, ground beef, or sausage.

c4ca98c041.gt:
In medium sized bowl, combine the cream cheese, picante sauce and pecans; blending well.
Take one slice of ham and spread a light layer of the cream cheese mixture onto the ham slice.
Beginning at one of the short ends, place a pickle and roll up tightly.
Once you get to the other end, place toothpicks in approximately 1/2 inch spaces.
I use 5 toothpicks per rollup.
Slice between toothpicks resulting in bite sized rollup.
Refrigerate until time to serve.
c4ca98c041.pred:
Combine all ingredients except pickles and wrap ham and cream cheese in foil.
Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour.
Unwrap and add pickles.
Bake for 15 minutes more.

7441333e16.gt:
Mix all ingredients well except almonds.
Form into ball and roll into almonds.
Makes 1 large or 2 small cheese balls.
7441333e16.pred:
In a medium bowl, mix cream cheese, pineapple, onions, green peppers, cherries, Worcestershire sauce and almonds.
Form into a ball.
Refrigerate 1 hour.
Roll in nuts.
Serve.

57bca3c7cb.gt:
In a small sauce pot, start heating the milk.
Once warm, add Nutella and whisk together until smooth.
Add cocoa, cinnamon, vanilla and salt.
Whisk and cook until it starts to boil.
Pour into mugs and top with LOTS of marshmallows.
57bca3c7cb.pred:
In a saucepan, combine milk, Nutella, Hershey's Cocoa Special Dark, cinnamon, vanilla extract, salt and marshmallows.
Bring to a boil and then reduce heat to low.
Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot with marshmallows on top.

06a62bd371.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Lightly grease 9x13 inch baking dish.
Arrange potatoes over the bottom of the dish, and set aside.
Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
Add the garlic and onion; cook and stir until the onion is transparent, about 5 minutes.
Stir in 3 tablespoons butter until melted.
Sprinkle the flour, salt, and pepper over the onion mixture.
Cook and stir until mixture bubbles and thickens, about 2 minutes.
Continue to stir the flour mixture while gradually pouring in the milk and buttermilk, and return the mixture to boiling.
Stir in 3/4 cup Parmesan cheese; cook for 2 minutes until melted, and mixture is smooth.
Pour the mixture over the potatoes in the baking dish, stirring to coat evenly.
Bake in preheated oven for 1/2 hour, and stir.
Bake 1/2 hour longer, stir the potato mixture again, and sprinkle with remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.
Bake for 20 minutes more.
06a62bd371.pred:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
Place potatoes in a large bowl and toss with butter, garlic, onion, flour, salt, and pepper.
Spread potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20 minutes, then turn potatoes over and bake for 10 minutes more.
While potatoes are baking, combine milk and buttermilk in a small bowl.
Stir in 1/3 cup Parmesan cheese.
Pour milk mixture over potatoes and bake for 5 minutes more.
Sprinkle with remaining Parmesan cheese and serve.

693873e2a3.gt:
Melt the butter in a medium saucepan and cook the onion gently over a low heat for 5 minutes until soft.
Add the pears and raisins and cook for 10 minutes.
Add the mixed spice, vinegars, sugar, cranberries, orange zest and juice and port, stir well and cook for another 10 minutes or so.
Season with a little salt and pepper.
Taste and then add more sugar or vinegar to your own taste - it may need some more, or you may be bang on!
This is best served warm.
693873e2a3.pred:
Preheat oven to 180C/350F.
In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat.
Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the raisins and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the cranberries and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the sugar, vinegars, orange zest and juice, port, and spices.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in the pepper and salt.
Transfer to a bowl and cool to room temperature.
Pour into a sterilized jar and seal.
Refrigerate until ready to use.

629fc487a6.gt:
Heat butter in saucepan over medium heat until foaming.
Add onion and garlic to butter.
Cook until lightly browned, stirring occasionally.
Add curry powder, stirring to coat the onions well.
Add corn, stir, and continue to cook.
In a small bowl, add the coconut milk slowly to the cornstarch, stirring to prevent lumps.
Add this mixture to the corn mixture, stirring well.
Add remaining ingredients.
Lower heat, and cook for about 7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
The coconut milk should be mostly absorbed.
Serve warm.
629fc487a6.pred:
Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic and cook, stirring, until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add curry powder and cook, stirring, for 1 minute.
Add corn and cook, stirring, until heated through, about 5 minutes.
Stir in cornstarch and coconut milk.
Bring to a boil, stirring, and cook until thickened, about 2 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

400c858727.gt:
1.
Place cocoa in a medium saucepan.
Gradually whisk in milk until cocoa has dissolved.
Add chocolate chips and crushed peppermint; simmer over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until chocolate and peppermint have melted, 8 to 10 minutes.
2.
Bring to a boil and immediately remove from heat.
Ladle into mugs and top with mini marshmallows.
Serve each with peppermint sticks, if desired.
400c858727.pred:
Peppermint Hot Chocolate:To make peppermint hot chocolate, combine the cocoa powder, milk, chocolate morsels, and crushed peppermints in a large saucepan.
Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in the marshmallows.
Serve immediately.

33a5002bf8.gt:
For carne asada:.
Marinate meat, then prepare ingredients for dressing, before grilling meat.
Plan to have flatbread warmed as you are ready to serve meat.
Marinate steaks in lime juice in a shallow glass dish for 1 minute.
Next add garlic, crushed red chile, black pepper, and Mexican oregano.
Marinate in refrigerator for at least 20 but no longer than 40 minutes.
While marinating meat:.
Combine all ingredients for Jalapeno Ranch Dressing in a 1 cup dish.
Mix well and refrigerate to let flavors blend.
Preheat oven to 170 degrees (or lowest heat setting).
Grill meat to desired doneness
Remove steaks from grill and let "rest" for 5 minutes.
Before meat is about to be taken off grill or while it is resting, add 1/3-1/2 cup of cheese on each flatbread.
Lay the cheese covered flatbreads directly onto middle oven rack and warm until cheese is melted.
Once meat has rested, cut meat against the grain into thin strips.
On each flatbread add desired amount of meat, 1-2 tablespoons jalapeno ranch dressing and about 1 T french fried onion strings.
Enjoy!
33a5002bf8.pred:
In a large bowl, combine flank steak or round steak, lime juice, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, black pepper, and optional Mexican oregano.
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Remove meat from marinade and grill for 5 minutes on each side or until desired degree of doneness.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl, combine mayonnaise, sour cream, buttermilk ranch salad dressing mix, jalapeno peppers, jalapeno juice, and cilantro.
To serve, place meat on flat bread and top with salsa and cheese.
Garnish with French-fried onions.

a9c2e7ef04.gt:
Combine the flour and cocoa powder, and sift.
Preheat the oven for 170C.
Crush the chocolate and put into a bowl.
Add the butter, and melt them over a double-boiler or in a microwave.
(When you are using the double-boiler, remove the chocolate from it at this point.)
Add the eggs, and mix well quickly.
The mixture will become a little bit thick.
Add the sifted flour and cocoa powder, and mix well.
Pour the mixture into the ramekins.
Bake for 10-15 minutes in the oven at 170C.
When you bake too long, the inside won't be creamy, so bake until just the surface is cooked.
Once it's cooled, you can microwave for 20 seconds at 600 W, and the creaminess on the inside will come back.
Addendum: When you are making this using paper cups, bake for about 9 minutes.
Please check them occasionally.
Even when you are using baking ceramic crocks, check them after about 10 minutes of baking.
Once the surface is cooked, insert a bamboo skewer around the edge instead of the middle, and check the doneness.
If the edge is not liquidy, you can take it out from the oven.
a9c2e7ef04.pred:
Preheat oven to 180C.
Melt chocolate and butter in a double boiler.
Beat eggs and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add in flour and cocoa powder.
Pour into a greased 20cm cake tin.
Bake for 30 minutes.
Cool in the tin for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack.
Serve with ice cream or whipped cream.

6976afc901.gt:
Cook Brussels sprouts in large saucepan of boiling water 10 to 12 min.
or until tender, adding cranberries to the cooking water for the last minute.
Drain Brussels sprouts mixture; return to pan.
Add dressing; toss to evenly coat.
6976afc901.pred:
Place all ingredients in a large bowl and toss to coat.
Serve immediately.

f7582fba0b.gt:
STOCK:.
Combine the first 7 ingredients in a large pot and bring to a full boil.
Cook at the full boil for approx 1 hour.
Use a colander to drain.
Return liquid to the pot.
Dispose of the carcass.
Puree the cooked vegetables and set a side to be used as a thickener later.
SOUP:.
Combine the rest of the ingredients (except the crackers) in your large pot.
Bring to a boil.
Cook for 1 - 1 1/2 hours on medium heat - stirring occasionally.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Add the crackers approximately 15 - 20 minutes before serving.
The crackers dissolve and thicken your soup.
The crackers are used rather than flour or starch in order to freeze the soup without it separating and they do not take away any of the flavour.
f7582fba0b.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Place lobster bodies in a large pot and cover with water.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer and cook for 15 minutes.
Remove lobster bodies from water and set aside.
In a large skillet, saute onion, celery, carrots, and potatoes in 2 tablespoons of butter until vegetables are tender.
Add 2 cups of water and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the imitation crabmeat, chicken stock, vegetable stock, cream, garlic powder, thyme, and sherry.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer and cook for 15 minutes.
Add the lobster bodies and cook for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and puree with an immersion blender.
If you don't have an immersion blender, transfer the soup to a blender and puree until smooth.
Return to the pot and reheat.
Season with salt and pepper.
Ladle into bowls and serve with crackers.

3f59ab0d36.gt:
Combine flour, salt, pepper in a ziplock bag .
Add chicken, shake to coat.
Heat oil and butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook until browned on all sides (about 5 mins).
Place in crockpot.
After removing chicken, put stock in the skillet and heat for 5 mins.
Pour into crockpot.
Add lemon juice, mushrooms and garlic to crockpot.
Cook on low for 2 hours.
Mix cornstarch and water, then add to crockpot.
Add remaining seasonings and capers.
Increase to high heat and cook for 30 mins.
Serve over rice and broccoli.
Top with parsley if desired.
3f59ab0d36.pred:
In a large skillet, heat the butter and olive oil over medium heat.
Add the chicken and cook until browned.
Add the mushrooms, garlic, shallot powder, dill, salt, and pepper.
Cook until the mushrooms are tender.
Add the flour and stir to coat the chicken and mushrooms.
Add the chicken stock and lemon juice.
Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes.
In a small bowl, combine the cornstarch and water.
Stir into the chicken mixture.
Cook for 5 minutes or until thickened.
Serve over rice.
Garnish with parsley and capers, if desired.

9f82ffde67.gt:
In a large saucepan, combine the water, shallots, garlic, thyme, peppercorns, kosher salt and oil.
Squeeze the lemon over the saucepan and add to the pan.
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a microwave-safe bowl, mix the sugar and vinegar and microwave at high power for 1 minute; stir to dissolve the sugar.
Add a pinch of crushed red pepper and the green papaya.
Season with sea salt and black pepper and toss to coat.
In a small bowl, mash the lime juice into the avocado and season with sea salt and crushed red pepper.
Place the halibut in a deep, medium skillet, leaving some space between the fillets.
Strain enough of the aromatic poaching liquid over the fish to just cover it.
Simmer the halibut gently over very low heat just until the fish flakes easily with a fork, about 10 minutes.
Spoon the mashed avocado onto 4 plates and top with the halibut.
Using a slotted spoon, mound the papaya slaw on the fish and serve right away.
9f82ffde67.pred:
Heat the water in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
Add the shallots, garlic, thyme, peppercorns, salt and sugar.
Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the lemon juice, vinegar, and crushed red pepper.
Simmer for 2 minutes.
Add the green papaya, rice vinegar, and lime juice.
Simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the avocado mash and simmer for 1 minute.
Serve with the fish.

594316d1ba.gt:
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Add rotini pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
Place cooked pasta in a large bowl and combine with sliced baby carrots, broccoli, red onion, cauliflower, green pepper and peppercorn ranch dressing; mix well.
Cover and refrigerate for several hours.
594316d1ba.pred:
Mix all ingredients in a large pot of boiling water.
Cook for 10 minutes.
Drain.
Add peppercorn Ranch salad dressing and toss.

5e36bf8c5c.gt:
Preheat a nonstick skillet over medium-low heat.
In a bowl whisk together the eggs, cream and powdered sugar.
Set aside.
Take 2 slices of the Texas toast and spread 1 tablespoon of Nutella on each one.
Sandwich them together and dip both sides of the sandwich in the custard mixture.
Grill on each side until brown, about 3-4 minutes per side.
Remove from heat and serve immediately with maple syrup while you repeat with the other ingredients.
5e36bf8c5c.pred:
Place the bread in a bowl and cover with heavy cream.
Let the bread soak for 10 minutes.
Beat the eggs and mix with the powdered sugar.
Dip the bread into the egg mixture and then into the Nutella.
Fry in a skillet until golden brown.
Serve with syrup.

3982f4b2bb.gt:
Heat grill to medium-high heat.
Grill steak 5 min.
on each side or until done (160F).
Transfer to cutting board; let stand 5 min.
Meanwhile, toss lettuce with onions and croutons.
Add dressing; mix lightly.
Place on 4 serving plates.
Cut steak into thin slices; place over salads.
Sprinkle with cheese.
3982f4b2bb.pred:
Heat grill to medium heat.
Place steak on grill and cook 4 to 5 minutes per side for medium rare.
Remove steak from grill and let it rest for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, toss lettuce, onions, and croutons in dressing.
Slice steak against the grain and serve with salad.

85ca6d6ceb.gt:
Mix all of ingredients.
Cook like pikelets.
(Take a tablespoon of the batter at a time and drop in a frypan with butter and basically cook as if it were an American pancake - brown underneath and then turn over - should be a lot smaller than normal pancakes).
85ca6d6ceb.pred:
Place the flour, sugar, baking powder and egg in a bowl and mix well.
Add the milk and melted butter and mix until smooth.
Heat a non-stick frying pan over medium heat.
Pour in the batter and cook until the edges are set and the top is golden brown.
Turn the pikelets over and cook for a further 15 seconds.
Serve hot with butter and syrup.

33a9be0b60.gt:
Beat cream cheese spread and shredded cheese in small bowl with mixer until well blended.
Add next 3 ingredients; mix well.
Refrigerate 1 hour.
Shape into ball; roll in parsley.
Serve with celery and crackers.
33a9be0b60.pred:
Prepare the meal by first making the cheese ball.
Mix together the cheeses, red peppers, green onions, Dijon mustard, and parsley.
Form the mixture into a ball and roll it in the celery.
Place the cheese ball on a serving platter and surround it with the crackers.
Serve with a bowl of your favorite dip.

51d188ef9a.gt:
Heat large covered saucepot of salted water to boiling on high.
Add orzo and cook as label directs.
Meanwhile, in 12-inch skillet, heat oil on medium until hot.
Add grape tomatoes; cook 5 to 6 minutes or until skins split, shaking pan occasionally.
From lemon, grate 1 teaspoon peel and squeeze 1 tablespoon juice; set aside.
Remove skillet from heat.
Reserve 1/4 cup orzo cooking water; drain orzo.
Add orzo and cooking water to tomatoes in skillet; stir in lemon peel and juice, feta, olives, mint, and 1/4 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper.
51d188ef9a.pred:
In a large bowl, combine orzo and olive oil.
Add grape tomatoes, lemon juice, feta cheese, olives, mint, and pepper.
Toss to mix.
Serve immediately.

f5d92fa57b.gt:
Heat the oven to 450 degrees F and arrange a rack in the middle.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Place apples in a large bowl with raisins.
Whisk together sugar, cornstarch, cinnamon, and salt in a small bowl until combined.
Sprinkle over apples and raisins and toss to evenly coat.
Arrange a sheet of phyllo on a large, flat surface with the shorter side toward you.
Brush with melted butter and arrange another sheet on top.
Repeat, alternating butter and phyllo, until there are 6 layers, then brush the top layer with butter.
Evenly arrange apple-raisin mixture on phyllo, leaving a 1-1/2-inch border at the top and sides.
Begin to roll the phyllo away from you, folding in the sides as you roll.
When youve rolled up the entire pastry, brush any exposed phyllo with butter.
Place the strudel seam side down on the prepared baking sheet, brush again with butter (you may have a little left over), and cut 4 (1-inch) diagonal slits into the top just through the phyllo.
Bake until golden brown, about 10 minutes.
Reduce the heat to 350 degrees F and bake until the apples are knife tender and the juices are bubbling, about 30 to 40 minutes more.
Let cool at least 10 minutes before slicing.
f5d92fa57b.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, toss the apple slices with the raisins, sugar, cornstarch, cinnamon, and salt.
Butter a 13-by-17-inch baking sheet.
Lay 1 phyllo sheet on a work surface.
Brush with melted butter.
Sprinkle with 1/4 cup sugar.
Repeat with 3 more phyllo sheets.
Spread the apples over the 4th phyllo sheet.
Brush with melted butter.
Sprinkle with 1/4 cup sugar.
Roll up the phyllo sheets starting with the bottom one.
Place the roll in the baking sheet.
Bake until golden brown, about 30 minutes.
Cool on a wire rack.
Cut into 12 slices.

0062ecba72.gt:
COMBINE flour, baking soda and salt in small bowl.
Beat butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar and vanilla in large mixer bowl.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition; gradually beat in flour mixture.
Stir in morsels and nuts.
Drop by rounded tablespoon onto ungreased baking sheets.
BAKE in preheated 375-degree [Fahrenheit] oven for 9 to 11 minutes or until golden brown.
Let stand for 2 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool completely.
PAN COOKIE VARIATION: PREPARE dough as above.
Spread into greased 15"x10" jelly-roll pan.
Bake in preheated 375-degree [Fahrenheit] oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool in pan on wire rack.
FOR HIGH ALTITUDE BAKING (>5,200 feet): INCREASE flour to 2 1/2 cups; add 2 teaspoonfuls water with flour; reduce both granulated sugar and brown sugar to 2/3 cup each.
Bake at 375 degrees Fahrenheit, drop cookies for 8 to 10 minutes and pan cookies for 17 to 19 minutes.
0062ecba72.pred:
Preheat oven to 350F.
In a large bowl, cream together butter and sugars.
Beat in eggs, one at a time.
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into creamed mixture.
Stir in chocolate morsels and nuts.
Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until edges are lightly browned.
Cool on wire racks.

4aec361465.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 F. Put the chickpeas into a bowl.
Coat the chickpeas with the olive oil, garlic powder and whichever spice you prefer.
Place on a sheet pan that youve lined with parchment paper and roast at 400 F for approximately 20 minutes.
Toss in the fresh chives, adjust the seasoning as needed and serve.
If you choose to saute them on the stovetop, use a cast iron or aluminum pan on medium heat and stir frequently for approximately 15-20 minutes.
4aec361465.pred:
In a small bowl, combine the chickpeas, olive oil, garlic powder, spice of choice, and chives.
Mix well.
Season with salt and pepper, to taste.
Serve with a side of bread or crackers.

8a241fe45b.gt:
First you separate the romaine hearts.
.Then you dice the other vegetables(excluding the apple).
Then put the diced vegetables in with the rest of the ingredients (Croutons,Cherry tomatoes).
Then add the apple inches.
Enjoy.
8a241fe45b.pred:
Heat oven to 350F.
Wash and cut apples, onion, carrots, celery, red and green peppers into bite-sized pieces.
Place in a large bowl.
Add cherry tomatoes and croutons.
Toss to combine.
Add romaine lettuce and toss again.
Spread on a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes.
Serve warm.

2c54bd25b1.gt:
Place whole chicken breasts into a casserole dish.
Sprinkle on the onion salt and the oregano.
Add onions, mushrooms, green pepper, olives.
Pour Pizza sauce over chicken and veggies.
Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 40-45 minutes, remove from oven and top with cheese.
Bake another 5 to 10 minutes or till the cheese is bubbly.
Serve with a green salad!
I hope you enjoy it!
2c54bd25b1.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Place chicken on bottom of 9x13 casserole dish.
Sprinkle onion salt over chicken.
Top with onion, oregano, mushrooms, pizza sauce, green pepper, and olives.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over top.
Bake for 30 minutes.

e2ffa57ffc.gt:
To make Dressing: Blend all ingredients in blender 1 minute.
Chill.
To make Salad: Cut tofu into 12 rectangular slices.
Lay 3 slices of tofu, overlapping slightly, on each of 4 plates.
Arrange cucumber slices around tofu, and fan avocado slices on plates.
Scatter sprouts, then green onions over vegetables.
Drizzle Dressing over Salad.
Sprinkle with furikake.
e2ffa57ffc.pred:
Mix all ingredients together in a bowl.
Serve with the salad on a bed of lettuce.

eb1ff69d12.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Mix all ingredients except Parmesan cheese and crackers until well blended.
Spoon into 9-inch pie plate; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Bake 15 minutes.
Serve with crackers or cut-up fresh vegetables.
eb1ff69d12.pred:
In a medium bowl, combine the spinach, Neufchatel cheese, and garlic.
Stir in the smoked almonds and mustard.
Season with pepper and Parmesan cheese.
Serve with crackers.

13a6ba0924.gt:
In a medium-sized pot, place dessicated coconut and water.
Mix and allow to soak for 1/2 an hour.
After 1/2 an hour, turn heat onto low and bring to a gentle simmer.
Simmer, covered, for 10 minutes.
Turn off heat and leave pot on element for 1/2 an hour.
After 1/2 an hour, transfer coconut mixture to blender or processor and process for 45 seconds.
Put a large sieve over a bowl and empty coconut mixture into it.
Press down hard on coconut solids with the back of a spoon to remove as much coconut milk as possible.
This method produces approximately 2 cups of coconut milk.
Can be made up to 2 days before use in a recipe and refrigerated, covered.
The milk will separate in the fridge, forming a creamy fat layer on top, and a thinner liquid layer underneath.
Not to worry, the fat layer will melt into the liquid when heated and form a lovely milk.
13a6ba0924.pred:
Place the coconut in a blender and add the water.
Blend until the coconut is finely chopped and the water is absorbed.
Strain the mixture through a cheesecloth or a fine mesh strainer.
Press the coconut milk through the strainer with a spatula.
Discard the coconut solids.
Use the coconut milk immediately or refrigerate for up to 2 days.

ee28b1bd5a.gt:
Over medium high heat saute the onions stirring frequently (5min).
Add the tomato paste and keep stirring (5min).
Next add the berbere and cook for 5 minutes adding a little bit of water when the bottom of the pot starts catching.
Keep stirring.
Add the rinsed lentils and cook together for an additional 5 minutes (continue to stir adding a bit of water so that the mixture doesn't burn).
Add about 5 cups of water and bring to a boil.
Occasionally stir.
Once the water reduces and lentils have thickened add the ground coriander, garlic and salt.
Reduce heat and leave for about 5 minutes.
Serve with injera.
ee28b1bd5a.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
In a large pot, combine the lentils, water, tomato paste, berbere, onion, garlic, coriander, and salt.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes.
In a small bowl, mix together the injera flour and water until a thick batter is formed.
Remove the lentils from the heat and stir in the injera batter.
Cover and let sit for 10 minutes.
Place the lentil mixture in a 9x13 inch baking dish and bake for 20 minutes.
Serve with injera bread.

55a63594d1.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F.
In a large bowl, combine 1/4 cup cheese, milk, egg, cumin, red pepper, corn muffin mix, corn, and green chilies; stir until moist.
Pour into a 9 x 13 baking dish coated with cooking spray.
Bake for 15 minutes.
Pierce surface liberally with a fork.
Pour enchilada sauce over the top.
Top with chicken and remaining 3/4 cup cheese.
Bake for an additional 15 minutes or until cheese melts.
Let stand for 5 minutes before cutting.
Serve with a dollop of sour cream on top.
Delicious!
55a63594d1.pred:
Place chicken in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Combine milk, egg, cumin, and red pepper in a bowl; pour over chicken.
Stir in corn muffin mix, cream style corn, chopped green chilies, and red enchilada sauce.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.
Serve with sour cream.

ea9ea44d2f.gt:
Place the cucumber, celery, garbanzo beans, carrots, raisins, and mint in a large bowl, and toss with the olive oil and red wine vinegar to coat.
Serve immediately.
ea9ea44d2f.pred:
In a large bowl, combine the sliced cucumber, celery, carrots, raisins, mint, and olive oil.
Mix well.
Add the red wine vinegar and toss to coat.
Serve immediately.

eca8b785b9.gt:
Preheat oven to 250-300 degrees celcius (or mark 6).
Peel potatoes, wash and drain well.
Slice the potatoes as finely as possible or use a slicer to make things easier.
Rub the garlic around a baking dish or skillet.
Grease the dish with butter.
I also greased it with cream cheese.
Start laying the sliced potatoes in the dish separating them only slightly, keeping them compact.
Add salt, pepper, parsley.
Add a layer of cream.
Spread the cream on the potatoes.
Add some grated cheese.
Repeat step 5 for as many layers as you have potatoes.
You might need to add cream or cheese.
On the final layer top with some parsley and a lot of cheese and bake for 45-60minutes.
eca8b785b9.pred:
Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with water.
Bring to a boil and cook until tender.
Drain and return to the pot.
Add cream, cheese, parsley, garlic, and butter.
Mix well and season to taste.
Cover and cook over low heat until the cheese is melted.
Sprinkle with additional parsley and serve.

1b5ad8b724.gt:
Cut cauliflower into florets.
Add them to the food processor and process until finely ground.
Dice one tomato and slice another tomato for garnishing.
In a large bowl, place the processed cauliflower, diced tomato, green onion, and garbanzo beans and mix.
Add 1/2 cup pesto and mix.
Taste and add more pesto if needed.
Season with black pepper.
Arrange the salad on a plate with tomato slices.
Infuse love and serve!
1b5ad8b724.pred:
Add the pesto sauce to the salad.
The photo shows a salad with cauliflower, chickpeas, tomatoes, and green onions.
The salad is served with pesto sauce.
The pesto sauce is poured over the salad.
The salad is ready to eat.
The salad is served with pesto sauce.

a777a9be09.gt:
In a wide mouth 1 quart jar, layer the barley, peas, rice and lentils.
Then layer around the edges the onion, parsley, salt, lemon pepper, bouillon and the alphabet pasta.
Fill the rest of the jar with the twist macaroni.
Seal and attach a gift card.
The gift card should read: Add contents of jar to 3 quarts of water, 2 stalks of chopped celery, 2 sliced carrots, 1 cup of shredded cabbage (optional) and 2 cups diced tomatoes.
Over medium low heat, cover and simmer about 1 hour, or until vegetables are tender.
a777a9be09.pred:
Combine all ingredients in a large saucepan.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 1 hour.
Stir in the pasta and macaroni.
Simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

a89cd4ec7b.gt:
Sprinkle all ingredients over 2 full slabs of pork/ribs
Light your grill and let coals cool to about 300F as to not over seer meat and fortify optimal flavor for an good medium paced cook
When ribs are 20 mins from finished brush both sides of ribs and continue to cook until finished (BBQ sauce should not be messy) BBQ sauce added to enhance flavor not overwhelm ribs
a89cd4ec7b.pred:
Mix all ingredients together and rub on ribs.
Place ribs in a roasting pan and bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour.
Turn ribs over and bake for another hour.
Serve with your favorite side dishes.

f140cdb94b.gt:
In a saucepan over medium heat, combine sugar and water.
Cook, stirring frequently, until sugar is dissolved.
Stir in vanilla and almond extract.
Cool, and refrigerate.
To serve: In a punch bowl with ice, mix 1 cup syrup with 2 liters ginger ale or lemon-lime soda.
f140cdb94b.pred:
Add all ingredients to a large pot and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Strain and serve.

eee6e2952e.gt:
In a bowl, toss the beef with 1/2 tablespoon of vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon of garlic, 2 teaspoons of sugar and the fish sauce; season with pepper.
Let stand.
In a bowl, toss the onion and vinegar.
In another bowl, mix the soy sauce with the olive oil and remaining 1/2 teaspoon of sugar.
Season with salt and pepper.
In a wok, heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil over high heat until smoking.
Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of garlic and 1/4 teaspoon of salt; cook until golden, about 30 seconds.
Add half of the meat and cook for 3 minutes without stirring; turn and cook 1 minute longer.
Transfer to a plate; cook the second batch.
Return the meat to the wok and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
On a large platter, toss the pea shoots with the onion and the soy dressing.
Spoon the beef on top and serve.
eee6e2952e.pred:
In a large bowl, combine the beef, vegetable oil, garlic, sugar, fish sauce, pepper, onion, vinegar, soy sauce, olive oil, and salt.
Mix well and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Heat a large skillet over high heat.
Add the beef mixture and cook, stirring occasionally, until the beef is browned and cooked through, about 10 minutes.
Remove from the heat and let cool slightly.
Add the pea shoots and toss to combine.
Serve immediately.

9a8b0b4825.gt:
Beat eggs and sugar, and zest together in a medium bowl.
Sift in the flour, melted butter, baking powder and lemon zest.
Stir to combine.
Preheat oven to 180AC (360AF).
Lightly grease a 23-cm (9-in) tart pan with rimovable base.
Divide the pastry into two by putting the first half into the pan.
Pour-in over the mixture half of green apples.
Pour then the other half of the mixture and cover again with the remaining apples.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, until the center is fine to touch and a shewer comes out clean when tested.
Leave the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before turning out into a rack to cool completely.
Serve, share and enjoy!
9a8b0b4825.pred:
Add the ingredients in the order listed.
Mix together the eggs, sugar, butter, flour, lemon zest and baking powder.
Add the apples and mix well.
Pour into a greased and floured 8 inch square pan.
Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.
Cool for 10 minutes before removing from the pan.
Serve warm or at room temperature.

c089da7346.gt:
In a food processor or blender, blend berries and sugar until completely pureed, about 5 minutes.
Scrape mixture into a 9 -x-9" loaf pan and freeze until solid, at least 4 hours.
c089da7346.pred:
Place berries in a blender and puree until smooth.
Add sugar and blend until smooth.
Pour into a container and freeze until firm.

34e60e4215.gt:
Whisk first 5 ingredients in bowl to blend.
(Can be made 1 day ahead.
Chill.
Bring to room temperature and rewhisk before using.)
Cut off peel and white pith from oranges.
Cut oranges into 1/4- to 1/2-inch-thick rounds.
Cut each round into quarters.
Transfer orange pieces to large bowl.
Add remaining ingredients and toss to combine.
Toss salad with enough dressing to coat and serve.

1.
In a large bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, orange juice concentrate, salt, and pepper.
2.
Add the oranges and arugula to the bowl and toss to coat with the dressing.
3.
Sprinkle the pomegranate seeds or dried cranberries over the salad and toss again.
4.
Top with the goat cheese and red onion.
5.
Toss one last time to combine all ingredients.

e621c384f2.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment.
Unfold pastry and cut into 4 equal squares.
2.
Spread 1 teaspoon mustard on each pastry square, leaving 1/4 inch border.
Layer 1 slice turkey, 1 slice Swiss, and 1 slice ham in the center of each square.
Whisk egg with 1 tablespoon water; brush onto edges of the square.
Fold squares to form triangles and crimp edges to seal.
Place on a baking sheet and brush with remaining egg mixture.
3.
Bake pastries for 25 minutes or until golden.
Dust with sugar and serve with preserves on the side.
e621c384f2.pred:
Prepare the pastry according to package instructions.
Cut the pastry in half crosswise.
Spread one half with honey mustard.
Place the other half on top of the mustard-covered half.
Spread the top half with the mustard.
Cut each half into 4 pieces.
Place 1 piece of ham, 1 piece of cheese, and 1 egg on each piece.
Roll up the pastry and secure with a toothpick.
Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.
Serve with raspberry preserves.

2a96229516.gt:
Brown sausage in a skillet over med.
heat.
Drain fat and transfer to crockpot.
Combine remaining ingredients in crockpot.
Cover and cook on low 8 hrs.
or on high 4 hrs.
Remove bay leaves.
Serve over cooked rice.

1.
Heat a large pot over medium heat.
Add the sausage and cook until browned, about 10 minutes.
Remove the sausage from the pot and set aside.
2.
Add the onions, green peppers, celery, and garlic to the pot.
Cook until the vegetables are soft, about 10 minutes.
3.
Add the sausage back to the pot.
Add the black beans, tomato sauce, water, and seasonings.

Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 1 hour.
4.
Add the rice to the pot and stir to combine.
Continue to simmer until the rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
5.
Remove from the heat and let sit for 10 minutes.
Serve over rice.

aaf069b0ba.gt:
Prepare coffee T DISC in mug or large heatproof glass.
Add brown sugar and light cream; stir.
Top with thawed whipped topping and a light sprinkling of ground cinnamon.
Add cinnamon stick.
aaf069b0ba.pred:
In a small saucepan, combine the coffee, brown sugar, cream, and cinnamon.

Remove from heat and stir in the whipped topping.

24b368b73d.gt:
To make Salad: Toast pine nuts in skillet over medium heat 5 minutes, or until golden brown.
Transfer to plate to cool.
Combine radicchio, radishes, fennel, and cucumber in large bowl.

In a large bowl, combine the radicchio, radishes, fennel, cucumber, mint, lemon juice, olive oil, maple syrup, and mustard.

6002037e6e.gt:
Add Angostura bitters to a chilled old-fashioned glass and swirl to coat glass; pour off excess.

Brown the chorizo and ground meat.
Add cumin, salt, ketchup, and garlic.
Beat the eggs add 2 tablespoonfuls of water as you beat them
In another pan add your beaten eggs fry, and roll the pan a bit.
add water and steam with lid on this is to toughen the egg a bit and to get eggs done.
Remove from heat add meat to it and roll it up shred the cheese on top.
Serve hope you enjoy!

c382163c5c.gt:
Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F. Set a rack on each of 2 baking sheets.
In a bowl, toss the sweet potato slices with the oil and season with salt and pepper; make sure each slice is coated with oil.
Arrange the slices in a single layer on the racks.
Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, rotating the sheets halfway through baking, until the chips are deeply golden.
The chips will crisp as they cool.

Season with salt and pepper.
Spread the slices on a baking sheet and bake at 400 degrees F for 20 minutes.

f4794c8922.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Smooth all filling ingredients together in a large bowl.
Place filling in a 9-inch glass pie plate and bake for 35-40 minutes, until golden.
Let cool for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, stir together topping ingredients and spread on top of cheesecake.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.

In a food processor, combine the first 3 ingredients and process until smooth.

Pour into a 9-inch pie pan and bake for 45 minutes.
Remove from oven and allow to cool.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours.

Enjoy!

0bb9567cbe.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Separate each biscuit into 3 pieces.
Place on baking sheet.
Combine the cheese, mayo, onion, bacon, sugar, garlic salt and hot pepper sauce in a medium bowl; mix well.
Place a spoonful of the mixture, spreading evenly, on each biscuit round.
Bake 10 minutes or until golden.
0bb9567cbe.pred:
Heat oven to 350 degrees.
Place biscuits in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
In a large bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, sugar, garlic salt and hot pepper sauce.
Pour over biscuits.
Bake 25-30 minutes or until biscuits are golden brown.

b150cd3f5e.gt:
Grease and flour a standard loaf pan.
Preheat oven to 350F.
Combine first 7 ingredients in bowl of food processor and pulse a few times to mix.
Add butter and one egg.
Process until mixture is moistened.
With machine running, add remaining ingredients, scraping bowl as necessary.
Bake for 1 hour and 10 minutes, or until tester comes out clean.
Cool in pan 10 minutes.
Remove from pan and cool on rack.
b150cd3f5e.pred:
Prepare cake batter:Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and ginger.
In a separate bowl, using an electric mixer, cream butter and eggs until light and fluffy.
Add pumpkin puree, vanilla, and mix until combined.
Add flour mixture to pumpkin mixture and mix until just combined.
Pour batter into a 9x13-inch baking dish, and bake for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool completely before frosting.

Add sugar, pumpkin pie spice, and vanilla and beat until smooth.
Frost cooled cake.

9c6c383e4a.gt:
Boil the spaghetti for 15 minutes.
Boil the soy granules for 10 minutes.
Heat the oil in a heavy skillet.
Add the diced onions.
Saute for 2-3 minutes.
Add the tomatoes, soy granules, ground pepper, sea salt, paprika, red wine and dry basil.
Cook for 3 minutes then add the yeast flakes and stir.

Last but not least, add the minced garlic cloves (we dont want to heat the garlic too much).
Pour the Bolognese sauce over the spaghetti, garnish with fresh basil, and serve!

Heat a large pan over medium heat.
Add the oil and garlic and saute for 1 minute.
Add the soy granules and stir to coat.
Add the onions and saute for 5 minutes.
Add the tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes.
Add the spaghetti and stir to coat.
Add the pepper and salt.
Add the wine if using.
Cook for 10 minutes.
Add the basil and stir.
Serve with fresh basil and Parmesan cheese.

96d86ade02.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Spray baking dish with cooking spray.
Add chicken pieces and season with garlic powder and onion powder.
Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes.
In a bowl, mix barbecue sauce, honey, ginger, and Worcestershire sauce.
Pour evenly over chicken and bake uncovered for 20-25 additional minutes or until sauce thickens and internal temperature is 180F.

Preheat oven to 350F.
Place chicken pieces in a baking dish.
Pour barbecue sauce over chicken.
Sprinkle with honey and ginger.
Sprinkle with Worcestershire sauce and garlic powder.

Serve with rice.

97692d5fc3.gt:
Spread tortilla with dressing and mustard; top with remaining ingredients.
Fold in opposite sides of tortilla, then roll up from one end, leaving top end open.
Place on microwaveable plate.
Microwave on HIGH 1 min.
or until heated through.

Combine the ingredients in the order listed in a spill proof shaker and shake until thoroughly mixed.
Top wtih whipped cream and grated chocolate, if using.

Blend until smooth.
Pour into a glass and top with half-and-half.
